full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'JAM DBYANGS NAG PO'I SGRUB THABS NYUNG DU RNAM GSAL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003B (CES 'JAM DBYANGS NAG PO'I SGRUB THABS NYUNG DU RNAM GSAL 'DI NI, DAD PA DANG RNAM DPYOD KYIS MDZES @004A *, ,PA'I DPON MO SANGS RGYAS SGRON MA'I ZHAL 'DON DU, DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS KYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
